messages.messageBody:

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] tv and witchcraft
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/19/2004 11:51:44 AM Eastern Standard Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: nor..as was my bigger worry... witchcraft type
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/19/2004 11:51:44 AM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
nor..as was my bigger worry..."witchcraft" type play from some of the shows
Sarah likes to watch. <<<<<


Man----you mean she's not turning other kids into TOADS???!!

If anyone has a kid who HAS learned how to do that from tv shows, could you
call me? I'd LOVE to watch!

~Kelly <BWEG>
